formula: a(n)=sum(k=1..n, ((-1)^(k-1)*(k-1)!*sum(i=0..n-k, binomial(n,i)*(k^i*stirling1(n-i,k))))). - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Jun 14 2011a(n) ~ (n-1)! * (-1)^(n+1) / (1-exp(-r))^n, where r = 2.5051123308583601790988703653235907822189... is the root of the equation exp(-1 + exp(-r))*r = 1. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[Log[1 + E^x*Log[1 + x]], {x, 0, 20}], x] * Range[0, 20]! (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015 *)
